message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's a fair start!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but we need to reach an agreement quickly before inflation eats away at our gains.
Inflation is hitting me harder, I need a better deal to make up for it.
We're running out of time, Bob. Let's split it closer to even before we both end up with nothing. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but this is my final offer.
